message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper focuses on person re-identification using deep learning techniques, specifically addressing the problem of pedestrian misalignment. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper proposes a new descriptor for person re-ID, which involves designing a CNN architecture and training a fully connected layer, indicating that it could also fall under cs.MM (Multimedia). The use of deep learning techniques and the focus on feature learning also suggest that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves designing a new architecture to address the problem of pose estimation errors, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper involves retrieval tasks, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
